name: Prof. Wanjiku Chiuri
title: Vice Chancellor
bio: Professor Wanjiku Chiuri brings extensive experience in higher education leadership and academic excellence. With a distinguished career spanning over three decades, she has been instrumental in shaping Riara University's vision of nurturing innovators. She holds a PhD in Educational Leadership and has published extensively on innovation in higher education.

name: Dr. James Mwangi
title: Deputy Vice Chancellor - Academic Affairs
bio: Dr. Mwangi oversees all academic programs and ensures the highest standards of teaching and learning across the university. With over 25 years of experience in academia, he has been pivotal in curriculum development and quality assurance initiatives.

name: Prof. Sarah Kamau
title: Deputy Vice Chancellor - Research & Innovation
bio: Professor Kamau leads the university's research initiatives and innovation programs, fostering collaboration between academia and industry. She has spearheaded numerous research partnerships and innovation hubs that have transformed the university's research output.

name: Dr. Michael Otieno
title: Deputy Vice Chancellor - Administration & Finance
bio: Dr. Otieno manages the university's administrative operations, financial planning, and resource allocation. His strategic financial management has enabled the university's sustainable growth and expansion initiatives.

name: Dr. Peter Ochieng
title: Registrar
bio: Dr. Ochieng manages the university's administrative functions, student records, and academic services. He ensures efficient operations of the registrar's office and maintains the integrity of academic records and student data.

name: Dr. Lando Welcome
title: Dean, Riara Law School
bio: Excellence in legal education and commitment to shaping the next generation of legal professionals. Dr. Welcome has extensive experience in legal practice and academia, with a focus on constitutional law and human rights.

name: Dr. Opati Welcome
title: Dean, School of Business
bio: Empowering students to become innovative leaders and entrepreneurs who drive positive change in the business world. Dr. Welcome brings decades of industry experience and academic excellence to business education.

name: Dr. Mary Wanjiru
title: Dean, School of Computing Sciences
bio: Leading innovation in technology education and preparing students for careers in the digital economy. Dr. Wanjiru is a renowned expert in computer science with research interests in artificial intelligence and software engineering.

name: Prof. Grace Njeri
title: Dean, School of Education
bio: Dedicated to preparing exceptional educators who transform learning environments. Professor Njeri has extensive experience in teacher education and curriculum development, with a passion for educational innovation.

name: Dr. Ahmed Hassan
title: Dean, School of International Relations & Diplomacy
bio: Expert in international relations and diplomatic studies, preparing students for careers in global affairs. Dr. Hassan brings extensive diplomatic experience and academic expertise to international relations education.

name: Dr. Linda Akinyi
title: Dean, School of Communication and Multimedia Journalism
department: School of Communication and Multimedia Journalism
bio: Leading the next generation of media professionals and communicators. Dr. Akinyi has extensive experience in journalism and media studies, with a focus on digital media and multimedia storytelling.

name: Mr. David Kimani
title: Director of Finance
bio: Overseeing the university's financial operations and ensuring sustainable growth. Mr. Kimani brings extensive experience in financial management and strategic planning, ensuring the university's fiscal health and sustainability.

name: Ms. Grace Muthoni
title: Director of Student Affairs
bio: Supporting student success through comprehensive services, programs, and resources. Ms. Muthoni is dedicated to creating a vibrant campus community that supports student growth, development, and well-being.

name: Dr. John Kipchoge
title: Director of Academic Planning
bio: Leading strategic academic planning and curriculum development initiatives across all schools. Dr. Kipchoge ensures alignment between academic programs and industry needs while maintaining high educational standards.

name: Dr. Patricia Wambui
title: Director of Research & Innovation
bio: Championing research excellence and innovation across all disciplines. Dr. Wambui facilitates research partnerships, manages research grants, and supports faculty and student research initiatives that address real-world challenges.

name: Ms. Susan Chebet
title: Director of Admissions
bio: Leading the university's admissions process and student recruitment efforts. Ms. Chebet ensures a fair and transparent admissions process while attracting talented students from diverse backgrounds.

name: Mr. Brian Mutua
title: Director of Information Technology
bio: Overseeing the university's IT infrastructure and digital transformation initiatives. Mr. Mutua ensures reliable technology services that support teaching, learning, research, and administrative operations.

name: Dr. Elizabeth Nyambura
title: Director of Library Services
bio: Leading the university library's mission to provide comprehensive information resources and services. Dr. Nyambura oversees digital and physical collections, research support, and information literacy programs.

name: Ms. Jane Wanjala
title: Director of Marketing & Communications
bio: Shaping the university's brand and communicating its mission to diverse audiences. Ms. Wanjala leads marketing strategies, public relations, and communications initiatives that enhance the university's reputation and visibility.
